title: Schedule Your Appointment
subtitle: Choose a convenient time for your consultation. We offer flexible scheduling to accommodate your needs.

googleCalendar.title: Schedule Your Appointment
googleCalendar.description: View available times and book directly through our calendar.
googleCalendar.instructions: Click the button below to view available appointment times with Rocio Jenkins, MSN, APN, PMHNP-BC. You can book a time slot that works best for you, or call us to schedule.
googleCalendar.viewCalendarLabel: Open calendar to view available appointment times

calendar.temporaryNotice: We've simplified our appointment booking process. View available times through our calendar or call us to schedule.

types.title: Appointment Types
types.description: We offer different appointment durations to meet your needs. All appointments are conducted via telehealth.
types.suitable: Suitable for consultations and follow-up appointments
